NotificationMessage.FormulaText: <%Type & " has scored a critical hit on " & Encounter.PartyMembers(partyMemberToAttack).Name & " and scored " & Format(AttackDamage, "n") & " damage!"%>
<%Type & " has scored a hit on " & Encounter.PartyMembers(partyMemberToAttack).Name & " and scored " & Format(AttackDamage, "n") & " damage!"%>
